data.actual_result: Sometimes it will say something about unsaved changes when you try to exit
data.expected_result: You just exit without anything about unsaved changes (And sometimes you can as I said above)
data.short_description: "Unsaved changes" in channel settings even if you haven't made any changes
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel (You might have to try multiple different channels.  It doesn't seem to always happen) - Tap the 3 dots in the top right - Tap channel settings - Now try to exit
